sequential_thinking_log.problem_statement: Initialize Codeflow workflow system for Privarion macOS privacy protection project

reasoning_chain.content: Need to analyze current project state and validate PRD document
Project lacks .project_meta structure - need to create full Codeflow infrastructure
Must implement mandatory Context7 and Sequential Thinking integration
Technology stack includes Swift, macOS frameworks, security APIs - needs research
Initiated Context7 research for Swift and system requirements

decisions_made.rationale: Project has no Codeflow structure - fresh implementation needed

decisions_made.decision: Start with Context7 research for Swift/macOS development
decisions_made.rationale: Technology stack requires deep understanding of macOS security frameworks
decisions_made.evidence: PRD indicates complex system-level programming requirements

decision_logs.reasoning: Complete adherence to Codeflow principles ensures systematic, quality-driven development
